testsuite.name: Computhink.Script.My_Preferences_Themes
testsuite.system-out: Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field UserName Details: Dipak Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Captcha is not present, proceeding with login. Click Login button Session for user is already active. Do you want to create a new session? Dialog box displayed. User clicks OK button. Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. User has logged in successfully.

Test Scenario 1 : Verifying and Set Theme Color or Font Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field Click on Refresh button Click on Setting Icon Click on My Preferences Click on Theme Option Select and Apply Theme setting with Green color Click on the Apply button Verified and added New mes successfully Click on Refresh button and page Refresh Successfully
